headline.main: RUSSIANS CLAIM LENINGRAD BREAK; Report Siege Lines Pierced at 2 Points, With Advance Still On, and Gains Elsewhere THE RUSSIANS ATTACK HEAVILY IN THE NORTH RUSSIANS CLAIM LENINGRAD BREAK

lead_paragraph: BERNE, Switzerland, Saturday, Nov. 15 -- Russian forces were advancing in the Leningrad sector early today after they had loosed a heavy attack against German concentrations along the entire line southeast of the city to Tikhvin, 125 miles to the east, it was reported by Soviet sources.
abstract: USSR forces claim Leningrad siege lines pierced at 2 points; gain on 20-mi front; 21 villages reptd retaken; Crimean area same; 4 Axis transports reptd sunk by USSR warships, Baltic Sea; map
